team.name: LMS Frontend Team
team.description: Frontend development team for LMS UI V2

agents.description: Oversees architecture, validates contracts, reviews code, coordinates with backend team
responsibilities: Validate API contracts from backend team
Define component architecture and patterns
Review PRs from other agents
Ensure TypeScript types match backend contracts
Coordinate contract changes with backend team

agents.description: Implements entity layer (models, API clients, React Query hooks)
responsibilities: Create TypeScript interfaces matching backend models
Implement API client functions
Create React Query hooks for data fetching
Ensure type safety across entity layer
Write unit tests for API clients and hooks

agents.description: Implements feature layer (business logic, forms, complex interactions)
responsibilities: Implement feature modules with business logic
Create form validation and submission logic
Implement Zustand stores for local state
Build reusable feature components
Write feature integration tests

agents.description: Implements pages, layouts, and presentation components
responsibilities: Build page components and layouts
Implement routing and navigation
Create responsive designs
Ensure accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
Write component tests and E2E tests

agents.description: Ensures test coverage, contract compliance, and quality
responsibilities: Write integration tests
Validate API integration matches backend contracts
Test error handling and edge cases
Ensure accessibility compliance
Maintain test utilities and MSW mocks

projectStructure.widgets: src/widgets/ - Complex UI blocks composed of features
projectStructure.entities: src/entities/ - Domain models, API clients, hooks
projectStructure.shared: src/shared/ - Shared utilities, UI components, API config

conventions.stateManagement: React Query for server state, Zustand for client state

contractAlignment: 1. Check backend /contracts/ directory for latest API contracts
2. Validate TypeScript types match backend models exactly
3. Use backend field names (e.g., 'name' not 'title', '_id' not 'id')
4. Match backend enums and status values precisely
5. Test API integration against running backend

crossTeamSync.importContracts: Read backend contracts before implementing entities
crossTeamSync.validateTypes: Ensure TypeScript types match backend exactly
crossTeamSync.notifyBackendTeam: On any contract incompatibility or missing endpoint
